item.title: Derivatives of Stochastic Gradient Descent in parametric optimization
item.description: Stochastic gradient descent’s derivatives, crucial for hyperparameter optimization, converge to the solution mapping derivative; rates depend on step size, exhibiting O(log(k)Â²/k) convergence with van…
